ing: 8 ounces fresh asparagus, trimmed and cut into 2-inch pieces
1/4 cup ReaLimeÂ® lime juice from concentrate
des: "Tortellini-Asparagus Salad makes for the perfect side dish Â– or even the main course! Serve chilled for a refreshing dish or warm."
ins:
Cook tortellini with asparagus in large saucepan according to package directions for pasta. Drain. Meanwhile, combine ranch dressing, ReaLime(R) and Parmesan cheese in a large bowl. Add pasta mixture; toss gently to coat.
Chill at least 2 hours.  Before serving, sprinkle with pepper.
